meaning: wound, hurt, injure, impair, pain, injury, cut, gash, scar, weak point

onyomiExamples.meaning: wound, injury, accident, casualty, assault, inflicting bodily injury

kunyomiExamples.meaning: wound, injury, cut, gash, bruise, scratch, scrape, scar, chip, crack, scratch, nick, flaw, defect, weakness, weak point, stain (on one's reputation), disgrace, dishonor, dishonour, (emotional) hurt, hurt feelings

unhurt, uninjured, unwounded, unscathed, unharmed, flawless (e.g. gem), unblemished, undamaged, perfect (condition), spotless (e.g. reputation), faultless (e.g. performance), perfect (record), without failure, without defeat
old wound, scar, old unpleasant incident, past misdeed
to hurt, to ache, to feel a pain, to be injured, to be spoiled (e.g. food), to be damaged
